analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x190e2028060fa49adefa5e1f47c8d7be0cbe5063.sol:
	Contract TRONIXGOLD has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x190e2028060fa49adefa5e1f47c8d7be0cbe5063.sol#222)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x190e2028060fa49adefa5e1f47c8d7be0cbe5063.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/26/0x190e2028060fa49adefa5e1f47c8d7be0cbe5063.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0x190e2028060fa49adefa5e1f47c8d7be0cbe5063.sol#92) is not in mixedCase
